experience.organization: Dhee Center of AI and Computer Science
highlights: Analyzed 1,000+ student academic records to identify performance patterns and trends.
Tested multiple machine learning algorithms to determine optimal predictive performance.
Evaluated Decision Trees, Random Forests, and Linear models to identify best-performing approaches.
Worked on MeetingAI, a web platform to automate meeting documentation from audio and video inputs.
Built a full-stack system integrating AssemblyAI for speaker-diarized transcription and Google Gemini for automated summaries, key points, and action items.
Streamlined post-meeting workflows by delivering instant, structured insights, eliminating manual note-taking.
